citation.article-title: Elevation of three subspecies of Pectobacterium carotovorum to species level: Pectobacterium atrosepticum sp. nov., Pectobacterium betavasculorum sp. nov. and Pectobacterium wasabiae sp. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of Pectobacterium carotovorum subsp. odoriferum (Gallois et al. 1992) Hauben et al. 1999
The description is given by Gallois et al. (1992), and some additional tests are listed in Tableâ€…3.
Strains cause soft rot of witloof chicory during forcing and decay of other plants such as leek, celery and hyacinth.
